name: Rolly Bones
description:
Controls:

Arrows / WASD = move

Z / Space = jump

X / Shift = roll (gives you i-frames)

Space = restart (upon death)

It's time to die!

Run, jump, roll, and hop around collecting souls to replenish your ever dwindling health. However, be careful as taking a tumble and landing on a new number can bring about all sorts of curses.

Featuring a lot of cool movement tech, such as:

  • bunny-hopping
  • roll-canceling
  • damage boosting
  • annoying Super Metroid style wall jumping

 Discover the mechanical depths of your platforming to collect as many souls as you can while triggering as few disasters as possible. 

There's only one map, so just try to survive as long as you can! (Timer not included)

((Made for GMTK Game Jam 2022--Theme: Roll of the Dice))
